TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks Instances of this class are passed to <xref:System.Net.OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler> methods.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates opening a stream to write data to be uploaded.
[!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#16)]
The following method is called when the stream is available.
[!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As Stream
public: property System::IO::Stream ^ Result { System::IO::Stream ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a writable stream that is used to send data to a server.
Docs.value: A where you can write data to be uploaded.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You should check the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> properties before using the stream returned by this property. If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property's value is an <xref:System.Exception> object or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the <xref:System.Net.OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property's value will not be valid.
## Examples The following code example uses the stream returned by this property.
[!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#15)]
